DOC.brief_summary: The purpose MyLife MyStyle Evaluation Project determine whether MyLife MyStyle group-level intervention reduces HIV sexual-risk behavior among 18- 29-year-old African American men sex men ( MSM ) . Specifically , project test whether participant MyLife MyStyle program report least 15 % absolute decrease frequency unprotected anal sex male partner three six month post-intervention compare wait-list control participant .
